A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I won't put in any spoilers or reasons why\,  but I have went to every single star wars movie since A New Hope.    The last Jedi is the first time I left the theatre trying to talk myself into loving the movie.  I just didn't. \n\nI wanted to sleep on it before I made up my mind.   It is alot to process.  But while there were moments I loved.   I mean loved.    This is the first star wars film I have ever left feeling deflated
